ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING:
You were approached by a scientific journal writing an educational article about even-toed ungulates (Artiodactyls). They want three specific pictures and offered you $750 per picture. If you photograph a dromedary camel, a gemsbok, and a Thomson's gazelle, you get $2,250. The resulting publicity should also boost your zoo fame.
Difficulty: Easy
Provide a photo of a dromedary camel, a photo of a gemsbok, and a photo of a Thomson's gazelle.
